## [Teaching Methods with R](https://ajwills72.github.io/rminr/)

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from site:** Research Methods in R is a set of guides on how to use R as your central research methods tool.
The target audience is psychology undergraduate students.
Research Methods in R is Creative Commons, so you are free to reuse these materials and adapt them as you wish, as long as you attribute them to their authors, and as long as your modifications have a Creative Commons licence.
